lines.transliteration_english: Log Bayd Giaan Oupadays Hai Patibrataa Kau , Man Bach Kram Svaamee Sayvaa Adhikaari Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The teachings of folk traditions and Vedas lay down that a faithful and loyal wife has the sole right to serve her husband devotedly in words and actions.

lines.transliteration_english: Naam Isanaan Daan Sanjam N Jaap Taapa , Teerad Barat Poojaa Naym Naa Takaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Such a loyal, devoted and faithful wife does not even look at all the futile rites and rituals like; meditations on various names, bathing at places of pilgrimage on specific days, charity, self-imposed discipline, penances, visit to holy places, fasting

lines.transliteration_english: Hom Jag Bhog Naeebayd Nahee Dayvee Dayv Sayva , Raag Naad Baad N Sanbaad Aan Duaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: For her, sacrificial fire, yoga, offerings, arid other rituals connected with worship of gods and goddesses are meaningless. She is not interested in any modes of singing, musical instruments, rationale and illogic or going to any other door.
